lines.text: Maybe this spell is... some kind of soul-ripping dealie?
What do you mean, soul-rippin' dealie?
Like, magic that rips someone's soul from their body and makes them into, like, a ghost.
So maybe the hologram's his ghost, and he died from having his soul taken out?
Do you have any reason to think it's a real spell, and that it works this way?
Maybe we can figure out something about how he died from the Living Memory hologram.
He's standing there... firing a gun... there's a bullet...
He's not injured or anything... he's not drinking poison... he's not getting hit by anything...
Dang. I think maybe this specific memory doesn't tell us anything about that.
Huh. No, it looks like this is a picture from <c=#FF00FF>before</c> he got burned.
Might be worth taking a look at the <c=#FF00FF>actual body,</c> then, huh?
Ugh, fine. Guess I'll check out Deady McBurnstink...
